thread.title: Mrs Heather Hall
thread.title_full: Blinds 2go reviewed by Mrs Heather Hall

author: Mrs Heather Hall
title: Mrs Heather Hall
text: This is the second order I have placed with Blinds2go. I have ordered both roller blinds and vertical blinds. The blackout roller blinds was very well made, lovely fabric colour and texture, and are excellent for blacking out my bedroom. The Vertical blinds in the Thermatex fabric are excellent and are stopping much of the cold from very large glass windows. Ordering is very simply. The prices are very competitive. The service from ordering the blinds is simply excellent, and they arrived exactly on time, well packaged with simply fitting instructions. I will certainly be using this company again in the near future.
